summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of South Lucile Street and providing for the establishing of grades therefor, between a point 228.75 feet east of the center line of 18th Avenue South and a point 455.76 feet east of the center line of 18th Avenue South; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of the land and other property necessary therefor; providing for the acquisition of the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on certain abutting property and providing for payment therefor.
